io.micronaut.views.thymeleaf

Class ThymeleafViewsRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.views.thymeleaf.ThymeleafViewsRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewsRenderer

    @Produces(value="text/html")
 @Singleton
public class ThymeleafViewsRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewsRenderer
    Renders templates Thymeleaf Java template engine.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo, graemerocher
    See Also:
    https://www.thymeleaf.org
